attributes.action: Speed up the opening of Stoke Mandeville Hospital Dialysis unit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Unit at Oxford is full and some patients are at risk from insufficient dialysis.  The patients at Wycombe have to travel long distances by ambulance & car to dialyse, when they live very near Stoke Mandeville, and the opening of a new renal unit would release beds for Oxford patients.  This unit has been planned (and postponed) for many years.
